pageContent: Purpose: There is a rising interest in measuring the societal burden of malignancies including prostate cancer. However, population-based studies reporting incidence costs of prostate cancer in the long term are lacking in Europe. The objectives of the study are to analyse the long-term costs and survival of prostate cancer patients treated by radical prostatectomy (RP) or conservative management (nRP).

metaData.source:
Variation in prostate cancer treatment associated with population density of the county of residence
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26782713/
